extendedInfo.description: Cyberoam Android Client facilitates users to log into Cyberoam UTM using Android based devices like mobile phones, PDAs and Tablets, without depending on a browser.

reviews.title: Latest update logs out every 5 mins- nexus 7
reviews.comment: I use a nexus 7 running android 4.2.2. Dear developers if you could give us back the previous version which was working fine, that would be great. Version 1.4 logs out at very frequent intervals. Or if you could fix the problem in the next update you have my 5 stars.
reviews.author: Josh Georgy

reviews.title: Very poor!
reviews.comment: Very disappointing..  Find myself logged out every 10 minutes.. Says app has stopped working. Frustrating! Please do something about it.
reviews.author: Sridhar Reddy

reviews.title: Decent, but has its bugs.
reviews.comment: Works well but logs off if the RAM is low, probably because the app itself is force-closed. Need to have a workaround for this issue. Everything else is great.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worst update....
reviews.comment: Nothing can be worse dan dis update. I hate myself for updating it. Logs out in every 2 minutes. Was far better in d previous version.  Thank you so much guys...
reviews.author: Hitesh Dalal

reviews.title: nice but needs improvement
reviews.comment: has utility but i\'m logged out the moment i open a heavy app...please find a way to stop this! 3 stars only because it has utility but logs me out itself
reviews.author: Vyom Maitreya

reviews.title: Fix its failures immidiatly
reviews.comment: sometime it unfortunately get stopped and it get logout  fix it...
reviews.author: Aman Singh

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: This app is quite frustrating. It automatically gets logged out at random intervals. Sometimes it will last 15 minutes before logging out and sometimes not even 3 minutes. This should not happen. I use it on an s3.
reviews.author: Kunal Agrawal

reviews.title: Excellent Apps
reviews.comment: Excellent Apps Really a good improvement now it is stable,   disconnection problem is resolve, Keep improving, keep it up..
reviews.author: manish Kumar

reviews.title: Newer Update isn\'t good
reviews.comment: Previous update can handle long time internet connection but newer update can\'t . I think auto login is not working properly till we click signout and signin. Please check and update soon.
reviews.author: rizvan hawaldar

reviews.title: Note 2
reviews.comment: I don\'t know what\'s the problem but it seems it logs me out in every 2 minutes.....  Please fix this  This app is not working pro properly
reviews.author: SANDEEP BALWADA

reviews.title: Improved
reviews.comment: Disconnection issue resolved. Earlier used to get disconnected if my tab is in idle mode. Keep improving client
reviews.author: Utkarsh Shah

reviews.title: GATEWAY IP
reviews.comment: Can anyone tell me what is the gateway ip of NIT JAIPUR for cyberoam. I am using cyberoam on laptop but when i try logging in this App  it shows an error \'GATEWAY NOT FOUND\". PLEASE HELP
reviews.author: Aditya Choudhary

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Logged out in every 5 min. As in browser.... Worst to see this... Why this is made ???  For disappointment
reviews.author: Manpreet Singh

reviews.title: Samsung grand duos quattro
reviews.comment: Sum bugs are in it its not connected long evry time u open the client after tht page will b open plz fix it not stable
reviews.author: Ashraf Limbada

reviews.title: Works Great.
reviews.comment: This app works great on my Galaxy Note 2 with office Wi-Fi. Easy to use and deploy.
reviews.author: Kartik Solanki

reviews.title: Auto disconnect
reviews.comment: Any fixes for the auto disconnect every 5-10 mins. It is very disappointing. Please fix it fast
reviews.author: Anirban Das

reviews.title: not able to login
reviews.comment: agter enterin gateway adress and my login details it says ubable to connect to gateway when tryin to login
reviews.author: Abhishek Ahluwalia

reviews.title: Worst app
reviews.comment: I hate this cyberom...max download speed is 10 kbps.... And disconnects automaticaly.
reviews.author: Tannu Behl

reviews.title: Missing- import configuration is missing
reviews.comment: As we import the configuration In windows based cyberoam, there is no option to import In android
reviews.author: PRAVEEN MISHRA
